div.p: The data underlying this study are owned by the Finnish Reindeer Herdersâ€™s Association, who actually owned the herd, while the Kutuhajru Reindeer Research Station is a branch of the Natural Resources Institute of Finland (LUKE), who curate the data. Data accession requests may be sent to Dr Jouko Kumpula, senior scientist at the Reindeer Research Station, using the following email address: jouko.kumpula@luke.fi. Additionally, their contact information is available online at: https://www.luke.fi/en/natural-resources/agriculture/reindeer-husbandry/. The authors did not have special access privileges.
